title: ‘We’re going to veto them’: Bessent backs new rules to give White House more power over Federal Reserve
description: Bessent said Treasury will veto Fed regional bank presidents, “unless someone has lived in their district for three years."
content: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Wednesday he would push a new requirement that the Federal Reserves regional bank presidents live in their districts for at least three years before taking offic… [+2079 chars]
